abstract: A Chinese department store operator, Maoye International Holdings, has hired two more investment banks to underwrite its postponed Hong Kong initial public offering, according to Dow Jones.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese department store operator, Maoye International Holdings, has hired two more investment banks to underwrite its postponed Hong Kong initial public offering, according to Dow Jones.

headline.main: Chinese Retailer Said to Bring HSBC and UBS on Board for I.P.O.
